rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFS2780, AFW2780, BFS2780} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {AFS3790, AFW3005, AFW3790, BFS3790}

description: This unit builds upon the understanding, knowledge and skills developed in AFS2780/BFS2780 (Corporate finance A). The unit provides a detailed examination of selected topics in corporate finance. These topics include: capital market history, risk and return, cost of capital, raising capital, financial leverage and capital structure, dividend policy, short-term finance and planning, current asset management, advanced capital budgeting, mergers , leasing, analysis and interpretation and valuations.
